Instruction: Whisk together cold water, sugar, cocoa powder, flour, cinnamon, cloves, and salt in a saucepan until well combined. Set over low heat and bring to a simmer, whisking continuously until the mixture thickens and becomes hot, about 4 minutes. Stir in the milk and heat until the hot chocolate starts to bubble around the edges. Incorporate the vanilla extract into the hot chocolate. Use an immersion blender to blend until smooth and slightly frothy.
